description: Introducing ICT Applications at Local Level and Enhancing Citizens' Participation

subproject.description: This project will provide direct support to increasing the capacities of local administrations in two municipalities of Albania (i) to better deliver their services; (ii) to enhance the interaction between the local governments and citizens; (iii) to increase involvement and participation of citizens in decision making. The project will support outcomes promoting transparency and accountability through the development of more effective and streamlined business processes. This can result in better and more equal access to services by the citizens, thus benefiting the most disadvantaged groups.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Introducing ICT Applications

subproject.corporate outcome: Government expand capacities to promote trade and investment while managing the equitable delivery of public services.
